forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain this morning. Some sun for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning wind and rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible this evening with partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 58F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
